attributes.action: Prevent UK Gov from revoking British Citizenship of Ethnic Minorities
attributes.additional_details: Prevent UK Gov from revoking British Citizenship of Ethnic Minorities I feel this law separate the nationalities from each other and this is a real racism and dividing the British people and give the feeling to other nationalities they are not belong to this country
attributes.background: Prevent UK Gov from revoking British Citizenship of Ethnic Minorities I feel this law separate the nationalities from each other and this is a real racism and dividing the British people and give the feeling to other nationalities they are not belong to this country

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Remove Clause 9 from the Nationality and Borders Bill: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/601583

Do not remove anyone's British citizenship: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/601611
